Host Nurse is offering 25% off for life on all unmanaged VPS plans when using the coupon "25VPS". The coupon can be applied to any payment term.


Why Host Nurse?
We at Host Nurse consider our clients as partners and we treat them that way. Our goal is to provide high quality services to ensure you will receive the best hosting experience.


Our Special Offer:
Use coupon code 25VPS to receive 25% off on a recurring basis, the coupon code can be applied to all shared web hosting plans and to any payment term.

• 99.9% Uptime
